pages.text: A $(item)Trial Spawner$() is a type of $(l:rare/spawner)$(item)Spawner$() found only within $(l:world/structures#trial_chambers)$(thing)Trial Chambers$(). $(br2)It spawns mobs in waves, which increase in number the more $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() are nearby. $(br2)When all of its spawned mobs are defeated, it ejects a combination of consumable items and/or $(l:rare/trial_keys)$(item)Trial Keys$(), then goes inactive for 30 minutes.

$(br2)It cannot be obtained as an item or moved by a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#piston)$(item)Piston$(). $(br2)A $(item)Trial Spawner$() converts into an $(item)Ominous Trial Spawner$() during an $(thing)Ominous Trial$() which is triggered when a $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() with $(l:brewing/effects#bad_omen)$(thing)Bad Omen$() comes near the spawners. $(br2)The $(item)Ominous Trial Spawner$() releases more difficult mobs and ejects more powerful loot.
